DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study compare pharmacokinetics Optivate速 subject 's current FVIII concentrate give bolus dose 50IU/kg . The secondary objective compare first second pharmacokinetic assessment Optivate速 ( recovery subject change batch ) evaluate Optivate速 term clinical tolerance safety .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Pharmacokinetics Safety Current Factor VIII Concentrate Optivate速 Haemophilia A .
DOC.criteria: Previously treat subject severe Haemophilia A ( < 2 % basal FVIII activity ) without inhibitor Factor VIII , least 12 year age , currently receive FVIII concentrate 20 exposure day .
